{"query": "How much money can I save by rightsizing my EC2 instances?", "response": "# 💡 AWS Optimization Recommendations

🎯 Routing to trusted_advisor - This query is about finding savings through EC2 instance rightsizing, which is directly related to cost optimization recommendations. AWS Trusted Advisor specifically provides rightsizing recommendations to identify savings opportunities, making it the appropriate agent to handle this query.








The error message I'm receiving is:

```
Error: Unable to retrieve Trusted Advisor cost optimization summary. Please check your AWS credentials and try again.
```

I apologize, but without access to the live Trusted Advisor data, I am unable to provide a detailed summary of your current cost optimization opportunities. At this time, I suggest you check the AWS Trusted Advisor console directly to view the latest recommendations and estimated savings.

If you are able to troubleshoot the API access issue, please let me know and I'll be happy to re-run the cost optimization analysis. I'm sorry I couldn't be of more assistance in this case.

Please let me know if there's anything else I can try to help with.
", "agent": "AWS-FinOps-Supervisor", "timestamp": "a52e7c78-37b6-434b-bb88-ec8a5bfbfc05"}
